projectInstructions.description: E-commerce project built with Next.js, Saleor, GraphQL, and TypeScript
guidelines: This project uses Next.js with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS for the frontend
The backend is based on Saleor e-commerce platform
Use GraphQL for data fetching with the schema defined in frontend/storefront/schema.graphql
Follow existing component patterns and file organization
Maintain type safety throughout the codebase
Prefer functional components with React hooks
Use Tailwind CSS for styling following existing design patterns
Follow the existing error handling patterns
The Configurator is the backbone for product and content modeling
Use dynamic attribute systems for extending product and page types

codeExamples.componentStructure: Use TypeScript interfaces for props and follow existing component export patterns
codeExamples.graphqlQueries: Follow existing GraphQL query patterns with proper typing
codeExamples.stylingApproach: Use Tailwind CSS utility classes consistent with the existing design system
codeExamples.configuratorUsage: Use the Configurator API to define and extend product types and attributes
